snippet.title: Sunset Hills Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Sunset Hills is the story of Nico, a novelist who travels from city to city in the aftermath of a war, visiting former comrades and learning about different ways of life. As they reunite, they recall their past experiences and reveal the true purpose of Nico's journey. https://twitter.com/CottonStudio #indiegames #gaming #pcgames
